overview: The Mucha Foundation presents a thirty minute documentary film about the life and work of Alphonse Mucha. The film captures Mucha's childhood and youth in Ivancice in Moravia and his student days in Munich. It follows his travels to Paris, where overnight fame awaited him, from Paris to America and finally his return to the land of his birth. The film explores both the creative development of this great artist and the fateful key moments which determined his life.
title: Alphonse Mucha
